title: S5 Ep36: Distracted donors and political violence
itunes:title: Distracted donors and political violence
description: When aid donors are distracted by domestic concerns, do aid recipients take advantage to suppress political opposition? Data from Africa suggest that they do, Dominic Rohner tells Tim Phillips. Photo: Alisdare Hickson.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
